summary: A drama following a French platoon during Algeria's war of independence.
cast: Benoît Magimel|Albert Dupontel|Aurélien Recoing|Marc Barbé|Eric Savin|Mohamed Fellag|Lounès Tazairt|Abdelhafid Metalsi|Vincent Rottiers|Lounès Machene|Adrien Saint-Joré|Guillaume Gouix|Ange Ruzé|Salem Aït-Ali-Belkacem|Antoine Laurent|Anthony Decadi|Xavier Rothmann|Timothée Manesse|Jeremy Azencott|Kamel Machene|Abdelhafid Danoun|Saïd Djili|Melik Bouarrar|Hassib Boukellal|Ebnjelloun Ilyassan|Martin Simenon|Hicham Hlimi|Gigi Terkemani|Mohamed Majd|Ibraham Mansouri|Abdelkhalek Youness|Amine Ennaji|Mustapha El Amraoui|Saïd Debiane|Saleh Ben-Saleh|Deborah Benzaquen|Maxime Biar
title: L'ennemi intime
